name: Brackeys Jam 2020.2 - Asbjörn the forgetful Wizard
name_original: Brackeys Jam 2020.2 - Asbjörn the forgetful Wizard
description:
Asbjörn - the forgetful Wizard  A relaxing Text Adventure

Hello friends,

this is the game jam page for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2. Please check out this relaxing Text Adventure about Asbjörn, an old Wizard who lives far off civilization. Sadly, he locked himself into a room by making the entrance disappear and can't remember the spell to get out of his house.

That's where YOU come into play: You must help Asbjörn remember (retrace his steps/go back his thoughts and memories -> reference to the theme :D ) the 3 letter spell!

The game is no crown jewel and there are plenty of things I could have done better, but I HAD TO JOIN BRACKEYS game jam, because I love Brackeys :) He was the first one who showed me how to do my first game (CUBETHON!), thanks Brackeys!

Please feel free to provide constructive feedback; happy to play your game as well and rate them fairly and constructivley! 

All the best,

Kai
